name: Pre-Order P.O.W.  "you won't take me alive" 12' LP Special edition LTD artwork
description:
We found 50 copies left from the sold out units of Product of Waste "you wont take me alive" first press and re-designed a special limited edition artwork in the memory of Terry Iovino to raise money for his family...please find it in your heart to support his family in this time of need.
                     - R.I.P T

name: Vice "flawed" color 7" w/download card
description:
Artist: Vice
Title: flawed
Format: 60 gram 7" color vinyl w/ DL card
Label: Frequency Deleted Records
Catalog: FDR#036V
Song titles:
Side a
   -since birth
   -every future is flawed
   -not in with the out-crowd
Side b
 -leave
 -last of the try hards
For fans of : Revenge, Product of waste and Shoot To Kill

Formed in Staten Island, NY, Vice is a 4 piece hardcore band who combines many styles into one and brings you a fast, pissed off, and heavy sound. With a strong DIY ethic they intend to never stop working, releasing, and touring. After touring relentlessly for the past year all over the U.S. on one album, they will release a new EP entitled "Flawed" on Frequency Deleted Records. The record is a very different style of power violence influenced hardcore that is focused mainly on the message. Fed up with and disgusted by just about everything, Flawed is 5 tracks of non stop hatred. 




Members: Andrew- Vocals James- Bass Dom- Guitar Alex- Drums

name: Trenchfoot 'endless disgust" on 7'' with free digital download card
description:
Trenchfoot is a hardcore band from Hudson Valley, NY with a dark, heavy sound for fans of Cursed, Converge and Tragedy. TF self released a 7" and now they're releasing another 7" with 8 killer tracks on FDR.
    Album tiltle Endless Disgust is recorded by Kurt Ballou (Converge,Doomriders) @ Godcity and master by New Alliance East.
   Pre order and reserve your copy now!!! First Press of 500 vinyls, 100 coke bottle clear and 400 Kiwi green color. Free digital download card.

name: Vultures "Empty sky/Hollow earth" full length cd format.
description:
Sean O'Coin- Vocals
 Rich Funk - Guitar
 Zach Bond - Guitar
 James Keenan - Bass
 Max Bond - Drums


Hailing from the Northeastern United States Vultures, consisting of members brought up by vastly different music scenes, has found common ground in their drive and passion to make music. Vultures's fusion of hardcore, metal, and punk elements places them in a league of their own. For fans of Carry on,Converge and Trap them.

name: SWAMPS "seven sides" on double 7" vinyl, with free download card
description:
Swamps formed in 2010 as a 3 piece hardcore/thrash band out of Western Massachusetts. Now with a heavier, hardcore mixed with crossover metallic sound, Swamps will be releasing a new record on double 7" color vinyl with free download card with the purchase.

First press of 100 ltd edition clear & white mix. 400 solid red ltd edition. With free download card!!!

name: Narratives "hell is here" on color 7" vinyl.
description: Narratives is a great band from three states, North Carolina, South Carolina and Florida. These guys played shows with Colony,Hate your guts and now their are part of the FDR family. Narratives "hell is here " is one of the most intense records coming out in 2012. For fans of Converge, cursed and turmoil.

name: Hostage "desensitized to violence" on color 12' vinyl with download cards.
description:
Vicious hardcore from Brockton Ma. When we heard this demo we were blown away by how raw and mean this band came across. After seeing them live we knew they had to be on our label. If you are a fan of Cold as Life, COA, and Blood for Blood this should be in your record collection.

   First press of 500 color vinyl with free download card. 100 yellow/black split color and 400 mixed colors.

name: Product of Waste "you won't take me alive" * Outside U.S.A. order 2 products minimum from the list.
description:
Rhode Island's Product Of Waste feature members of Colin Of Arabia and bring a fast, thrashy hardcore attack with plenty of anger, mosh parts and singalongs, all at a breakneck speed comparable to bands like Ceremony and Trash Talk, with some guitar solos thrown in for good measure. 

***For those that don't have paypal account. Send a money order or a certified check (we don't accept personal checks). FDR P.O. For shipping cost send an extra 4.00 whithin the U.S.soil and for outside the U.S. soil the same except  you need to order a minimum of two items for us to ship your product. Thanks

name: The FAKE BOYS "sleepwalk" * Outside U.S.A. order 2 products minimum from the list.
description: THE FAKE BOYS (Sleepwalk ep) Straight out of the merrimack valley comes the fake boys. This Massachusetts power pop-punk trio draws influence from The Ramones, Descendents, Jawbreaker, Dinosaur Jr, and Husker Du. Complete with endless hooks, ear bleeding volumes, and DIY attitude, this band promises to set up camp in your head for days. Perfect for summer nights, winter snow storms, or a show in your basement. Destroy the Radio!

name: WORD FOR WORD "keepsake" *Outside U.S.A. order 2 products minimum from the list.
description: Word For Word "keepsake"(NHXHC) Debut cd full lenght from this up and coming New Hampshire hardcore outfit.

name: HYG s/t * Outside U.S.A. order 2 products minimum from the list.
description: HATE YOUR GUTS (s/t). A fierce hardcore band from Connecticut. Heavily influenced by Hatebreed and Integrity, CT's Hate Your Guts bring six tracks of intense, metallic hardcore to this debut release and exhibit their fury playing shows up and down the East Coast including an appearance at the 2009 Significant Records Fest.

name: VEGAS "NeVVeR" *Outside U.S.A. order 2 products minimum from the list.
description: VEGAS (NeVVer) Vegas gave life to their artistic vision shortly after the dawn of the new millennium. With creative fires ignited by the physically confrontational nature of Japanese punks G.I.S.M. via the unrepentant early-'80s ferocity of bands like Life's Blood and Negative Approach, the group channels their raw metallic attack through the intense apocalyptic tenets of the "holy terror" hardcore spearheaded in the '90s by the legendary Integrity (whose enigmatic frontman Dwid joins forces with vocalist and lyricist T on "Rhythm of Decline").

name: CRUEL HAND "LOCK AND KEY"
description: Full of just as many catchy, metallic riffs as mosh parts, "Lock & Key" is a heavy mix of influences like Madball, Leeway, Cro-Mags, Metallica, Suicidal and Obituary, and is one of the most well-rounded hardcore albums in recent memory. "Lock & Key" was recorded in Wakefield, MA with producer Jay Maas (Verse, Bane, Defeater) and illustrates what Cruel Hand is capable of both lyrically and musically - this is more than just a progression of their past material, this is a defining release for Cruel Hand. Cruel Hand has shared the stage with bands like Have Heart, Bane, Terror and Death Before Dishonor, and will continue to tour the globe non-stop in support of "Lock & Key." Vinyl version includes digital download.

name: ANTIDOTE "thou shalt not kill" 7"
description: Antidote's "Thou Shalt Not Kill" EP is one of the most sought-after pieces of hardcore history. Released in 1983, there were only 1,000 copies of this 7" originally pressed, and subsequently, bootlegged versions started to pop up everywhere in various formats. Today, Bridge Nine Records is proud to announce that the label will re-release this landmark EP. Now available on colored vinyl. Vinyl version includes digital download.

name: LIVING HELL "oblivion"
description: "Oblivion," Living Hell's second album, is a clear and definitive progression from their debut record, "The Lost And The Damned." Combining hardcore, punk, thrash and black metal, "Oblivion" is truly a unique and moving record. For fans of Slayer, Hatebreed and Integrity. Now available on colored vinyl.

name: ALL OUT WAR "hymns of the apocalypse"
description: This is the long awaited repress of the out of print 7" originally released on S.U.R. Records. These 2 songs from NY's All Out War were originally intended for an Astor Records NYHC compilation that never saw the light of day. All Out War is a punishing display of the aggression of hardcore crossed with the brutality of metal while avoiding the shortcomings of both genres. To get a taste of All Out War's musical style, envision Carcass colliding head on with "Age Of Quarrel" era Cro- Mags.

name: FOR THE WORSE "for the good,for the bad,for the worse
description: After a multitude of releases on more than a few labels, New England's most rotten hardcore punk band, For The Worse, grace the masses again with a 10"/CD worth of 12 fast, pissed, oi-inspired songs that translates into an insane live show.

name: COALESCE "give them rope she said" color vinyl
description: A limited repressing of this diamond in the dirt, completely remixed and remastered, with all new artwork. Color vinyl of course, with no labels! Totally nutty.
